title: Evasive Action (Full Movie) Classic '90s Action, Crime | Roy Scheider, Don Swayze, Dorian Harewood

sources.title: Evasive Action (Full Movie) Classic '90s Action, Crime | Roy Scheider, Don Swayze, Dorian Harewood
sources.description:
Santa Ana Federal Penitentiary is closing and five of its most dangerous criminals are to be transferred to the Redwood Maximum Security Prison.When the brakes on the train fail, 200 tons of steel thunder become out of control heading towards Los Angeles train station.As U.S. Marshals try to stop the train from outside, one of the prisoners tries to disengage the last cars to save the passengers.But the rest of the prisoners who want to escape are hunting him down to stop his efforts.

Directed by Jerry Jacobs
1998
Starring:
Roy Scheider
Dorian Harewood
Ray Wise
Delane Matthews
Clint Howard
Don Swayze
Dick Van Patten
Keith Coogan

Edited for YouTube ad standards
